featured.text: But Brahma thought 24 would do because he believed humans would dig into the earth and climb every mountain, and eventually find it.
Much of the forest land where tea is grown in Assam is flat and thus farmers must dig drainage trenches to prevent water from accumulating and hurting the shrubs.
Since that time humans have been going up and down the earth, digging, climbing, and exploring—searching for something already within themselves.
When mothers try to dig their babies out, both may be trapped and smothered by thick mud.

other.text: Why do farmers in Assam dig trenches in tea gardens? (A) To protect tea trees.
The Amazons are completely dependent on their slaves ____(29)___ their sharp jaws, so well suited for fighting, are useless in taking care of larvae or for digging.

definition.zh_def: 挖掘，通常指用工具或手挖掘土壤或其他材料。
definition.en_def: To break up and move earth or other materials with a tool or machine.
definition.example: They decided to dig a hole for the new tree.
